name: unchic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not stylish or fashionable: She was an unfussy, unchic woman of plain tastes. She lived in a small apartment in an un-chic part of town.
More examplesFewer examplesThe young chef has transformed an unchic side street into a culinary destination. Those impulse buys and clothes you bought to be worn once are now decidedly unchic.The overall effect is odd but cool, and not un-chic.They'll likely want to have dinner at the highly un-chic hour of 7 o'clock.
